resources.string: Enable General Accessibility Service to access this option
Enable App Blocker Accessibility Service to manage app blocking
Specify duration of focus mode in mins
Block all uninstall attempts for a specified number of days.
Block all uninstall attempts until the anti-uninstall protection is removed with a password
Make sure not to forget this password. You may not be able to exit anti-uninstall without it.
How long would you like to keep anti-uninstall enabled?

Enabling this would unlock the following in Reality:
1. App Blocking
2. Focus Mode 

 Reality needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app. This lets Reality block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions.

 Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

" Enabling this would unlock the following in Reality: 1. Anti-Uninstall (Setup required to run) Reality needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app. This lets Reality block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions. Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected. "
Please provide device admin permission to access this feature
End time must be after start time has passed!
You still have %1$d days to go before unlocking anti-uninstall
Please wait %1$d seconds before pressing proceed

Reality uses the Accessibility permission to provide features like app monitoring to enhance your experience. This permission allows Reality to detect app activities and help manage device usage effectively. Rest assured, all data is processed locally on your device and is never sent to any server or third party. Your privacy and data security are our top priorities. By pressing Accept, you acknowledge and agree to the above .
Perform actions like a back press
Reality uses Device Admin permission to enhance security and block uninstalling Reality until a specific period. All data remains securely stored on your device and is never shared externally.
Prevent uninstallation attempts until a set condition is met
Are you sure you want to discard all changes and exit?

If you enable this, you won\'t be able to change configurations such as adding blocked apps, keywords, and more until you remove anti-uninstall. Your existing changes will be used for the entire period.
ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO TURN ON ANTI UNINSTALL? There is no turning back...
Quick toggle Focus Mode from your home screen
